Detailed Description

Represents a push-Chronometer widget.

Push-Chronometers can be pressed, or clicked, by the user to perform an action.

The following example demonstrates how to use the Chronometer

 gaia::ui::Chronometer* mpChronometer = new gaia::ui::Chronometer(static_cast<Page*>(this));

 // set Chronometer text
 mpChronometer->setText("Hello, World!");
